channel.title: Nodejs on J Arboleda
channel.description: Recent content in Nodejs on J Arboleda

item.title: Web development environment
item.description: In this post we’ll configure an advanced web development environment. For that, we’ll have our web hosted on a server (we will NOT use that server for development), and in our station we’ll have a virtual machine. For this vm we’ll use vagrant with the scotch box, which allows us to host a web without extra work Prerequisites We’ll use the following tecnologies for our environment. You should review them before going on:
